title: Caring For Earth
description: Caring for Earth informs readers about the many things that can be done to make a big difference for our planet. Each page suggests a new way to help the Earth along with a supportive photograph to enhance the text. Students will have the opportunity to learn about connecting to prior knowledge and determining the author's purpose.
meta: difference, Earth, electricity, recycle, reuse, tend
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Short Vowel Sounds : Discriminate short vowel /e/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word when

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
